title: (x) 'Good times are never ending': handwriting font - PC Childish {Andreas H}
author: Diamond

comments.content: The font is PC Childish from ProvoCraft, now [http://www.pccrafter.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202131634/http:/www.pccrafter.com/ "http://www.pccrafter.com/"). Maybe not available any more.
